Package ru.nsu.fit.smolyakov.snakegame.model.snake.ai

Class AISnake

java.lang.Object
ru.nsu.fit.smolyakov.snakegame.model.snake.Snake
ru.nsu.fit.smolyakov.snakegame.model.snake.ai.AISnake
Direct Known Subclasses:
SamuraiAISnake, StayinAliveAISnake
public abstract class AISnake extends Snake
An abstract class for AI-driven snakes. Implementing classes should override thinkAboutTurn() method, that is called every time the snake is about to make a turn. This method is supposed to contain logic that decides which direction the snake should turn to.
